name: EmailSystem
author: EmailSystem Email Marketing

sections.description:
EmailSystem WordPress plugin

The EmailSystem Sign Up Form plugin makes it easy to grow your newsletter subscriber list from your WordPress website. With this plugin you can generate sign up forms to automatically add subscribers to your EmailSystem subscriber lists.

If you don’t have an EmailSystem account yet, you can signup for a FREE trial here.

Once you activate the plugin, you may creat sign up forms for new or existing subscriber lists and use it via the provided shortcode.

Setup is fast and easy! You just need to enter your EmailSystem account API token and you’re all set.

All generated forms have double opt-in enabled as well as a mantatory checkbox in order to be GDPR Compliant.

You can also integrate with WooCommerce to place a checkbox for newsletter subscription during checkout.
sections.installation:
Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type the plugin name and click Search Plugins. Once you’ve found our plugin by emailsystem you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.

Manual installation

The manual installation method involves downloading our plugin and uploading it to your webserver via your favourite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.
sections.changelog:
=1.4=
Checked compatibility with WP 5.6 and bug fixes.

=1.3=
Updated urls and fixed minor bugs.

=1.2=
Fixed a bug that prevented form editing.

=1.1=
Bootstrap was removed since it was causing incompatibilities.

1.0

First version of plugin.

short_description: Use a Drag and Drop Form Builder to create Subscription Forms for the EmailSystem email marketing platform.
